name: Runny Butt
description: Runny Butt is an endless runner platformer with infinite fart-filled action and fun starring “Butty” the butt. Leave as many skid marks as you can and pick up the pace as you run faster and faster forever. Fart your fanny from platform to platform and don’t miss or you’ll sink in the yellow river or urine that’s full of floating turds, toilet paper, and other fun stuff found floating in sewers and polluted rivers. Go Butty!
